item.description:
Last month, most of you missed out on a spectacular hike in the southeastern portion of the park. We'd like to give you another chance at it. Meet at Parking Lot #2 off Upper College Pond Road (where we meet for the Bentley Loop hikes). We'll shuttle over to park off Circuit Road. I don't have the exact mileage but we were out a little less than two hours and that included an off-trail exploration of a small lightning strike fire site and stopping to listen to highly unusual bird calls (which Peter's friend swears were mourning doves but I'm not so sure). The hike also passes the area where group members have been building birdhouses.

Hope to see you there.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Does lightning strike twice? Join us on this out-Standish hike on Sept 5th
